title: Input schema of the BoardGameGeek trend scraper

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Seed URLs to crawl (BGG hot/trending pages or specific game pages). Examples: https://boardgamegeek.com/hot, https://boardgamegeek.com/browse/boardgame

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of HTTP requests the crawler will perform.

useBrowser.title: Use Playwright (for JS-rendered pages)
useBrowser.description: If true, use PlaywrightCrawler (slower but can handle JS). Default false.

useBggApi.title: Use BGG XML API2 for metadata
useBggApi.description: If true, fetch structured metadata from BoardGameGeek XML API2 (recommended for details).

followInternalOnly.title: Follow internal links only
followInternalOnly.description: If true, only follow links within BGG host(s) to avoid crawling unrelated sites.

concurrency.title: Concurrency
concurrency.description: Number of parallel requests for CheerioCrawler.
